page.title: 16Playground Games
page.content: Our playground games fall roughly into three sorts,chasing,skipping and hiding.We also have lots of rhymes for choosing the leader or"dipping for it".In many chasing games,the person caught becomes"it" but some are tag games where a person caught can be "saved" by someone else.British Bulldog,Fast Tag and Lurgie are popular though we have twenty other chasing games.Skipping games can be divided into games where one person stays"in" for as long as they can and the "keep the kettle boiling" type where children follow one another rapidly with the actions becoming harder each time round.These games usually have a rhyme or song to give the rhythm.There are many hide and seek games,usually with a safe haven. 52 Bunker and Tree Hunt are popular.
